title: Thrall

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Gore. Roleblock them, then both you and them gain 1 stress.
- At night, choose a player to Menace. Gain 2 stress, then control them into visiting you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have basic defense against players you Menace.
- You do not learn roles while controlling players.
- While at 5+ stress, you are Ferocious. You give +1 stress to any player you visit, or who visits you.
